channel.title: Https on ColorfulDark Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Https on ColorfulDark Blog

item.title: Android https: Certificate verification failed
item.description: There are always https requests in the project, and no third-party SDKs are used. The requests are implemented using HttpUrlConnec tion. It has been safe and sound, and suddenly the tester reported that there was a certificate verification problem. All kinds of viewing materials on the Internet are solved.
